Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35176 affecting package rubygem-rexml for versions less than 3.2.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35176 affecting package rubygem-rexml for versions less than 3.2.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-rexml is earlier than 3.2.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-35176
